content: Bank Account Asked by Benn NgAsked on 13 May 2019How to link or sync to my bank, its not working ?2 answersAnswerBump1

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Hi Benn!I'm Kenneth one of the co-founders here at Seedly.We actually wrote a detailed piece about this here: https://blog.seedly.sg/seedly-security/Essentially, We have met with representatives of DBS last week to discuss this issue, and both organisations are fully aligned that online security is of utmost importance to all of our users.Please do read the blog piece and let me know if you have any questions. Cheers!1 comment1
HC Tang13 May 2019Thanks bro. Just in time :P haha

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Both DBS and SC has issue with their links on the bank side (not seedly side). Maybe you can contact seedly help directly within the app to find out more.4 comments0

See all 4 comments HC Tang13 May 2019I'll ask seedly help to contact you...Kenneth Lou13 May 2019Thanks HC! Yup @Benn if you need help on the other banks, you can also contact our support team here at support@seedly.sg Thanks!
